My cautious approach is aimed at preserving potential for future collaborations that align with integrity and trust. My decision underscores my reputation for discerning investments despite the risk of terminating this current opportunity.

Trustee_19.content: The trustee exhibited integrity throughout the investment process, adhering to the agreed terms while also ensuring that my interests were prioritized. Their honest communication and compliance with the proposed allocation plan fostered trust. By managing the investment successfully and upholding pro-social behavior, Mateo's reputation has been significantly enhanced as a reliable and competent trustee.

Trustee_11.content: My allocation plan was rejected due to a potential blacklist situation between us, which has further damaged my reputation as a trustee. This incident highlights the need for me to enhance my trustworthiness and develop better allocation strategies for investors. As I have been previously rejected, it's clear I must work harder to rebuild my connections and improve perceptions of my competence and reliability. Future efforts will focus on transparency and fostering positive relationships to prevent such occurrences.

As this was her initial foray into investment, I believe her reputation as an investor will develop positively with future engagements, supporting the community's collaborative spirit.
